Control Name: COST 1.1 Establish a cost optimization function
Control Statement: Create a team that is responsible for establishing and maintaining cost awareness across your organization. The team requires people from ﬁnance, technology, and business roles across the organization.

control_attributes.Control: COST 1.1 Establish a cost optimization function
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you implement cloud ﬁnancial management?
